sqlMap.select: select to_char(RQ,'yyyy-mm') "SJ" , sum(YKSLA +YKSLA+YKSLC+YKSLD+YKSLE+YKSLF+YKSL) "YKS" from "HHLY_SJZQ" where "JQID"=#jqid# group by to_char(RQ,'yyyy-mm') order by to_char(RQ,'yyyy-mm')
select to_char(RQ,'yyyy-mm') "SJ" , sum(YKSLA +YKSLA+YKSLC+YKSLD+YKSLE+YKSLF+YKSL) "YKS" from "HHLY_SJZQ" where "SXBM"=#qxbm# group by to_char(RQ,'yyyy-mm') order by to_char(RQ,'yyyy-mm')
